channel.title: Getting npcs
channel.description:
im using spartans scape and i cant make npcs... i wana make a starter thing were u start on tut island and then work ur way throught it can anyone help me?
also i want 2 make a menu as you logg in saying welcome 2 hamipkscape make ur way throught the island and go 2 game! commands are ::phats ::starter ( after the island) ::jesus ::players
if someone help me on this i make em admin if they wana come on 2 my server[br][size=1]Posted on: June 24, 2007, 09:28:36 AM[/size][hr]anyone?[br][size=1]Posted on: June 24, 2007, 09:43:30 AM[/size][hr]????[br][size=1]Posted on: June 24, 2007, 09:49:31 AM[/size][hr]ffs! can someone code like?

item.title: Getting npcs
item.dc:creator: @ownage_plz ownage plz
item.description:
@ownage_plz wrote:

open autospawn.cfg and add a

spawn = ####	####	####	0	0	0	0	0	0	npcname

change the first set of #'s to the npcid then the next 2 sets to the npcs x and y coords then for the menu open your client and declare this method

public void MainHelpMenu() { if(playerRights < 4){ sendQuest("@dre@Main Menu", 8144); //Title clearQuestInterface(); sendQuest("Welcome to hamipkscape", 8145); sendQuest("", 8147); sendQuest("", 8148); sendQuest("", 8149); sendQuest("", 8150); sendQuest("", 8151); sendQuest("", 8152); sendQuest("", 8153); sendQuest("", 8154); sendQuestSomething(8143); showInterface(8134); flushOutStream(); } }
add text in the ""s to make it say something example given above

then find public void refreshSkills()
and scroll down a ways till you see

playerLastConnect = connectedFrom;

then under that add or replace if you already have it

//openWelcomeScreen(201, false, 3, ((IPPart1 << 24)+(IPPart2 << 16)+(IPPart3 << 8)+IPPart4), lastlogintime); MainHelpMenu();

Read full topic
